item.description:
An event for Minilympic teams only. Please do not RSVP unless you are registered in the Minilympics roster.

This event will be an elimination style tournament. Each round, player(s) with the lowest score will be eliminated until we have a winner or winners.

This event is worth 30 points for 1st place and 15 points for 2nd place. All teams will receive 5 points for participating.
.

 

The Game: Tactics is defined as taking careful action to achieve a specific end.. of course, doesn't every game engage us in this way?  Blokus is a good example of engaging in raw tactics, drawing on the part of your brain used in forming military strategy much like chess and its war gaming derivatives do, without needing to lose oneself in fantasy or complex simulations.  Get as many pieces of yours to fit on the board as you can, while stopping your opponents from doing the same.  Heck, this could even be used as an IQ test. :-)  This game is popular not only within our group, but other gaming groups in Massachusetts as well.

Tournament will run from 6pm to 10pm for 8 players.  If you wish to participate as a spectator, please say so in the comments and we will have room on a first come, first serve basis for 8 people.

 

*** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** ***
Did you know? (A Tribute to Gaming around the World):

From the Doing-It-Right-The-First-Time Dept., The Game of Go, brought to us by China, holds the honor for being the oldest board game whose rules were not lost, modified, reinvented, reinterpreted or re-imagined throughout history since its conception.
